name: Jumping Lights!
description:
You control a ball which must jump across the platforms 
until you reach the end. Pretty easy, right?
    The best part comes now:
You will carry a flame that will indicate 2 colors 
depending on whether you press the jump key or not. 
    Depending on the color you mark, you can fall on one surface 
or another. That is: if the flame is blue, you can only fall 
on blue surfaces, and the same with the pink color.
    You can change the color of the platforms at any time with 
the mouse keys. 
    The "ball" can only jump when it is in a straight position. 
That is: with the eyes up and the stomach down.
This means that if you are not in the correct position and press 
the jump key ... Your character will not jump but it will change 
the color of its flame and you will fall into the void if you do 
not change the color of the platform quickly.
    I forgot!
You must reach the target before the camera passes you or you 
will be dead.
    PD: It's my first game and I'd like to keep working on it.
So... I will be happy to receive advice :D
